fields.title: None of us is as smart as all of us
fields.content: We are a group of synthetic biology students who strongly believe in the power of the web of data and of new communication technologies. We want to empower our research field with these new technologies to help people meet, share experiences, cooperate and in the end advance science.
fields.pre_rendered_content: We are a group of synthetic biology students who strongly believe in the power of the web of data and of new communication technologies. We want to empower our research field with these new technologies to helppeople meet, share experiences, cooperate and in the end advance science.

fields.name: sidebar
fields.content:
<script src="http://widgets.twimg.com/j/2/widget.js"></script>
<script>
new TWTR.Widget({
  version: 2,
  type: "profile",
  rpp: 4,
  interval: 6000,
  width: 250,
  height: 300,
  theme: {
    shell: {
      background: "#333333",
      color: "#ffffff"
    },
    tweets: {
      background: "#ffffff",
      color: "#000000",
      links: "#4e962e"
    }
  },
  features: {
    scrollbar: false,
    loop: false,
    live: false,
    hashtags: true,
    timestamp: true,
    avatars: false,
    behavior: "all"
  }
}).render().setUser("synbionews").start();
</script>
